title: General
fullText:
A safety service shall be controlled by a main switch that is separate from main switches used to control: (a) any part of the general electrical installation; and (b) other types of safety services.

Main switchboards shall be installed in accordance with Clause 2.10 and the National Construction Code or the New Zealand Building Code.
note: Typical examples of main switchboards with one and two normal supplies are shown in Figures 7.2(A) and 7.2(B) respectively.
